text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
One evening, I find Symboli Rudolf<n>gazing out onto the track
with a deeply<n>moved expression on her face.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: Ah, it's you. Good timing. Do you<n>have a moment?

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
Don't worry, it's nothing serious. I<n>wanted to share this
view with you,<n>that's all.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
Do you see Narita Brian over there?<n>She's in the student
council with me.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
The other day, she told me she'd<n>dethrone me—that no
crown is so<n>secure that it can't be knocked off<n>one's
head.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
It's as she says. With each passing<n>day, she grows
stronger and faster.<n>She runs doggedly toward her prize,<n>
never looking back.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
Each student in this academy invests<n>the entirety of their
spirit into running<n>ever faster toward their goal.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
And seeing that motivates me in turn.<n>As the Tracen
Academy student<n>council president, and as someone<n>who
wishes for their happiness.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: There is yet more I must achieve for<n>their sakes.
choice_data_list:
All the more reason you can't afford to be
dethroned right now.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: Precisely.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
If I am to stand above my peers and<n>guide them, I must
prove myself<n>worthy of such a position.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
The path before us is clear. However,<n>neither of us can
achieve such a<n>Herculean feat alone. We must work<n>in
lockstep—

text_block_list.name: Umamusume A
text_block_list.text: Eek!

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: Hm? What was that?!

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
Look—over there! A pair of students<n>just collapsed! Quickly,
follow me!

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: Pant... pant... Are you all right?!

text_block_list.name: Umamusume A
text_block_list.text: Huh?! P-President Rudolf?!

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
Don't force yourself to move. You<n>just took a fall, didn't
you? Could one<n>of you explain what happened?

text_block_list.name: Umamusume B
text_block_list.text: U-um, well, actually...

text_block_list.name: Umamusume A
text_block_list.text: No, wait! I'm sorry! It's my fault!

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: Hm?

text_block_list.name: Umamusume A
text_block_list.text:
We were just... well, we were tickling<n>each other, and we
lost our balance,<n>that's all...

text_block_list.name: Umamusume B
text_block_list.text:
W-we're sorry! We didn't mean to<n>take up your time!
Don't worry about<n>us, we'll be fine!

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: It's fine, I didn't mean to cause any—

text_block_list.name: Umamusume
text_block_list.text: We're so sorryyyyy!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: The girls dash off as fast as their legs<n>can carry them.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: ...I suppose I should be glad that<n>neither was hurt.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
That said, I jumped to a hasty<n>conclusion and ended up
frightening<n>those poor girls. I still have much to<n>learn...
How embarrassing.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
I do want to close the gap between<n>the other students and
myself, but it's<n>certainly not going to happen anytime<n>
soon.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
Thank you. I truly appreciate it. I'm<n>looking forward to your
guidance from<n>here on out.
